item.title: New startup!
item.description:
Launch of dotch, a startup for zero waste packaging, mentored and financed via the EXIST programme!

item.title: New release - Flair version 0.9!
item.description:
Flair (v0.9) released, adding speed and many new NLP tasks to Flair!

23.08.2021 - Research grant: DFG-funded project “Efficient Model Learning from Data with Partially Incorrect Labels” in the Science of Intelligence (SCIoI) cluster of excellence approved! Positions for PhD candidates available from October 2022!

item.title: New release - Flair version 0.8!
item.description: Flair (v0.8) released, adding our powerful FLERT approach and HuggingFace model hub support to Flair!
